bill.summary:
Protecting Consumers from PFAS Act
This bill adds the Consumer Product Safety Commission to the interagency working group to coordinate federal activities related to research about perfluoroalkyl or polyfluoroalkyl substances, commonly referred to as PFAS.
No additional funds are authorized to be appropriated to carry out the bill.
